name: ZeroG - 495 Advanced Production
description:
All donations go directly to the Computer Graphics Club at Chico State, less a 10% donation to Itch.IO for hosting services

Inspired by the ice caves in the ever-popular Pokemon series, ZeroG is a top down puzzle racing game focused on competition and quick decision making. Every move you make through your maze can lead to the path of the goal, or to the void of space. You can race through over 100 levels with up to 4 players locally or against computer players.
